info.title: Go54
info.description: GO54 provides a RESTFUL API based on simple HTTP requests.

post.description:
#### Request Parameters:

- **`email`** (string, required, email): The email address of the user.
- **`password`** (string, required): The user's password.
- **`otp`** (string, optional, min: 6, max: 6, regex: /^\[0-9\]+$/): One-time password (OTP) for two-factor authentication. If provided, it should be a string of 6 digits.
    

#### Validation Rules:

- **`email`**: Required and must be a valid email address.
- **`password`**: Required.
- **`otp`**: Optional, but if provided, it must be a string with a minimum length of 6, a maximum length of 6, and contain only numeric characters.

This endpoint allows users to register in the system by providing the required information.

#### Request Parameters

- **`email`** (string, required, email): The email address of the user.
- **`firstname`** (string, required, min: 3): The first name of the user.
- **`lastname`** (string, required, min: 3): The last name of the user.
- **`phonenumber`** (string, required, min: 10): The phone number of the user.
- **`password`** (string, required, min: 6): The user's password.
    

#### Validation Rules

- **`email`**: Required, must be a valid email address, and must be unique in the "users" table.
- **`firstname`**: Required, must be a string, and must have a minimum length of 3 characters.
- **`lastname`**: Required, must be a string, and must have a minimum length of 3 characters.
- **`phonenumber`**: Required, must be a string, and must have a minimum length of 10 characters.
- **`password`**: Required, must be a string, and must have a minimum length of 6 characters

This endpoint allows users to reset their password using a valid password reset token.

#### Request Parameters

- **`token`** (string, required): The password reset token obtained from the system (system sent via email or sms).
    
- **`password`** (string, required, confirmed): The new password for the user.
- **`password_confirmation`** (string, required): Confirmation of the new password.
    

#### Validation Rules

- **`token`**: Required, must be a string, and must be a valid token sent by the system.
- **`password`**: Required and must be confirmed (match the `password_confirmation` field).

This endpoint allows users to initiate a password reset by providing their email address.

#### Request Parameters

- **`email`** (string, required, email, exists:users,email): The email address of the user requesting a password reset.
    
- **`reset_url`** (string, required, url): The URL where the user will be redirected to reset their password.
    

#### Validation Rules

- **`email`**: Required, must be a valid email address, and must exist in the "users" table.
    
- **`reset_url`**: Required and must be a valid URL.

message.example: A password reset link has been sent to your email

value.message: A password reset link has been sent to your email

get.description: This endpoint allows the user to refresh their authentication token.
This endpoint retrieves the content of the user's shopping cart.
This endpoint retrieves information about the authenticated user.
This endpoint retrieves a list of domain extensions available for registration, transfer, and renewal on the system (top-level domains).

post.description:
This endpoint is for making a whois search on the availability of the user's prefered name, the search are based on the extensions (TLDs) available on the system.

#### Request Parameters

- **`domain`** (string, required): The domain name to be validated.
    

#### Validation Rules

- **`domain`**: Required and must match the specified regular expression for a valid domain format.

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: This folder contains the API endpoints responsible for user authentication and authorization within the application.

tags.description: This folder contains the API endpoints responsible for user's cart system and checking out on the application.

tags.description: This folder contains the API endpoints responsible for applying payment to user's order on the application.
